Type.description: The type of the credit note.

Contact.description: The contact associated with this credit note.

Date.description: The date of the credit note.

DueDate.description: The due date of the credit note.

DueDateString.description: The due date of the credit note in string format.

Status.description: The status of the credit note.

LineAmountTypes.description: The types of line amounts used in the credit note.

LineItems.description: List of line items associated with the credit note.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount of the credit note.

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of the credit note that has been applied to other transactions.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount on the credit note.

Total.description: The total amount of the credit note including tax.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the credit note was last updated.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the credit note.

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date when the credit note was fully paid.

CreditNoteID.description: Unique identifier for the credit note.

CreditNoteNumber.description: The unique number assigned to this credit note.

Reference.description: Any additional reference information for the credit note.

SentToContact.description: Indicates if the credit note has been sent to the contact.

CurrencyRate.description: The exchange rate between the credit note currency and the organization's default currency.

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit amount on the credit note.

Allocations.description: List of allocations associated with the credit note.

BrandingThemeID.description: The ID of the branding theme used for this credit note.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the credit note has attachments.

DateString.description: The date of the credit note in string format.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the credit note.
